AIR_DEATH_HYBRID.description:
Hybrid Dragons are composed of two elements.
When a breath result is rolled, apply both elemental breath effects.
Hybrid Dragons are affected by any spell or effect that can affect either of its elements.
AIR_DEATH_HYBRID.name: Air/Death Hybrid Dragon

AIR_EARTH_HYBRID.description:
Hybrid Dragons are composed of two elements.
When a breath result is rolled, apply both elemental breath effects.
Hybrid Dragons are affected by any spell or effect that can affect either of its elements.
AIR_EARTH_HYBRID.name: Air/Earth Hybrid Dragon

AIR_ELEMENTAL.description: The standard dragon is an Elemental Dragon. It is made up of one of the five elements.
AIR_ELEMENTAL.name: Air Elemental Dragon

IVORY.description:
Ivory Dragons may be summoned by using any one single element of magic or by any effect of a single element (such as a Dragon's Lair or Dragon Staff).
Ivory Dragons may only be summoned from the Summoning Pool. They may not be summoned from another terrain.
IVORY.name: Ivory Dragon

IVORY_AIR_HYBRID.description:
Ivory Hybrid Dragons are composed of one element and ivory.
When a breath result is rolled, apply the elemental breath effect.
Ivory Hybrid Dragons are affected by any spell or effect that can affect its element or ivory.
Ivory Hybrid Dragons can only be summoned from a terrain by magic or an effect that matches their element.
IVORY_AIR_HYBRID.name: Ivory/Air Hybrid Dragon

IVORY_DEATH_HYBRID.description:
Ivory Hybrid Dragons are composed of one element and ivory.
When a breath result is rolled, apply the elemental breath effect.
Ivory Hybrid Dragons are affected by any spell or effect that can affect its element or ivory.
Ivory Hybrid Dragons can only be summoned from a terrain by magic or an effect that matches their element.
IVORY_DEATH_HYBRID.name: Ivory/Death Hybrid Dragon

IVORY_EARTH_HYBRID.description:
Ivory Hybrid Dragons are composed of one element and ivory.
When a breath result is rolled, apply the elemental breath effect.
Ivory Hybrid Dragons are affected by any spell or effect that can affect its element or ivory.
Ivory Hybrid Dragons can only be summoned from a terrain by magic or an effect that matches their element.
IVORY_EARTH_HYBRID.name: Ivory/Earth Hybrid Dragon

WHITE.description:
White Dragons have ten health instead of five.
All damage inflicted from a White Dragon's claws, jaws, tail and wing results are doubled.
In addition, treasure results are also doubled, allowing two units to be promoted instead of one.
White Dragons count as two normal dragons when assembling forces.
White Dragons can only be summoned by the Summon White Dragon spell.
WHITE.name: White Dragon
